Shareholder Name: General Organization for Social Insurance - Saudi Arabia

Description: National Medical Care (known as: Care) is a public company, listed on Saudi Stock Exchange “Tadawul” (TDWL) since March 2013. Care operates within the Health Care Equipment and Services sector focusing on Health Care Services. Care is based in Riyadh, Saudi Arabia and was established in October 2003.
